body.name: ATX/M‑ATX/ITX Case,Gaming Computer Case Chassis,Open Air Case Frame Graphics Card Mining Machine Cas,DIY Motherboard Rack Mine Rack,Good Heat Dissipation Effect
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Sturdy Durable】: The open computer case is sturdy and durable, fully protects the graphics card and electronic equipment, and can be stacked firmly.
【Good Heat Dissipation Effect】: The widely body heat dissipation design greatly increases the distance between the graphics cards to ensure a good heat dissipation effect.
【Open Design】: Through this open design, the motherboard is cooler. Sufficient space is reserved between the graphics cards.
【Scope of Application】: Support motherboards (ATX, M‑ATX, ITX) within 305x245mm, keep all cables clean and orderly, and all items in the miner.
【High Quality Materials】: Made of high quality SECC, the open chassis has the best craftsmanship, sturdiness, durability, and long service life.
body.description: Feature: 1. Sturdy Durable: The open computer case is sturdy and durable, fully protects the graphics card and electronic equipment, and can be stacked firmly. 2. Good Heat Dissipation Effect: The widely body heat dissipation design greatly increases the distance between the graphics cards to ensure a good heat dissipation effect. 3. Open Design: Through this open design, the motherboard is cooler. Sufficient space is reserved between the graphics cards. 4. Scope of Application: Support motherboards (ATX, M‑ATX, ITX) within 305x245mm, keep all cables clean and orderly, and all items in the miner. 5. High Quality Materials: Made of high quality SECC, the open chassis has the best craftsmanship, sturdiness, durability, and long service life. How to Use: Install and use Specification: Item Type: Open Chassis Material: SECC Model: for MK 01 Color: Black Function: Computer Case Scope of Application: Support Motherboards within 305x245mm (ATX, M‑ATX, ITX) Support Power Supply: Standard ATX Power Supply Size: Approx. 150mm / 5.9in, Approx. 86mm / 3.4in, Approx. 140-250mm / 5.5-9.8in Support: 1 SSD, 1 HDD Package List: 1 x Bottom Plate1 x Backplane 2 x Fixed Plate 1 x Screw Pack 1 x Boot Line

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 20 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget case, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: This is an exceptionally functional case and while awkward to assemble does the job very well.The only adjustments I would ask for;-the power supply to be mounted with all four screws. (which admittedly would make the case taller.-Some clear markings (I didn't see any) for assembly. It took about 15 minutes of trial and error to assemble it, and (admittedly left the hard drives mounted incorrectly because it looks better.)-flush mounting holes/tabs so I can wall mount this more easily.I'd pay 5 bucks extra for optional wall/psu bracketing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what I got it for
reviews.reviewText: As a whole this open air chassis does what I need it to do. Some minor issues: threads on all holes are not threaded well, you need to force the screw a bit, base and back section don't quite line up perfectly, space for mounting HD is a bit too small to be useful. As you can see from the picture I added a 2 HD mounting chassis, USB and audio ports chassis and custom made power switch/reset switch/power LED/HD LED/speaker bracket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but cheap
reviews.reviewText: Yeah here the price is not quite low enough to reflect the profit margin. This is a flat pack with minimal quality. It does fit ATX just fine, I have fitted 18 motherboards already without problem. A full ATX power supply does fit but you only get two screws on one side to hold it in. All the fasteners and stand offs are the lowest quality and honestly hurt this product since I bet most complaints stem from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this item
reviews.reviewText: It's actually trash you can't even assemble it the screw holes do not align nor do they line with any ATX motherboards obviously they didn't know what they were doing in the manufactured this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Assembly was a breeze. Pay attention to the hardware. There were three types of screws within the standard ATX kit. The instructions outlined two types. No big deal but worth noting due to the threads varying.I didn’t expect much more than a secure place to test gear and this will do nicely. Plenty of hardware. Great packaging. Engrish instructions. And a fancy hex head driver to install the standoffs. I’m not quite sure what the semi-transparent plastic hickeys are for, though.I will gladly vouch for this product. Hopefully the attached images help make sense of assembly.@darthkielbasa

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: assembly was a lil bit of a pain but after i got it put together it works fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not bad quality, but not ATX
reviews.reviewText: This case won't fit an ATX motherboard and power supply. But if you have something smaller, the material quality is metal and not bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item is excelent for a testing bench. Easy to install and easy to remove motherboards. I am already using it to test video cards and motherboards
